Developer Terms of Use
des:
Choose your sound scene, and let amidAudio weave an always-unique, never-repeating soundscape, providing the perfect backdrop for concentration, meditation, reading, focus, relaxation, or sleep.

Escape unwanted noise, enhancing your ability to concentrate while meditating on your subject of study. Amid the gentle sounds of some other place, elevate your reading experience with a focused ambiance. Whether you're reading a book, relaxing, sleeping or studying, amidAudio is your ideal companion.

NOTE: amidAudio sounds best and is the most immersive when using headphones or a high-quality sound system with a wide left/right stereo separation. Some Alexa devices can be paired in stereo.


Activate the skill using:
 "Alexa, open amid audio"

You are encouraged to ask it for "Help" to learn about the various capabilities. But you may quickly get started by:
 - Saying, "Alexa open amid audio", and be sure to enunciate clearly.
 - Then, ask it to "list some random scenes"
 - Then, "Play scene Springtime Sprinkle", for example

"Alexa, ask amid audio to list scenes", for how to view the full and growing catalog.

Avoid having to remember scene titles by say, "Alexa, ask amid audio to tell me about favorites."

Limit the play time by saying, for example, "Play scene for 2 hours." It will then prompt you for a scene title. Note, the skill cannot understand speaking a scene title and a duration in the same utterance.

Recommendations:
 - Wake up in the morning to "Alexa, ask amid audio to play Daytime in the Countryside."
 - Go to sleep at night saying, "Alexa, ask amid audio to play Mountain Stream at Night."
 - Imagine your on a campout to, "Alexa, ask amid audio to play Southeastern Night."
 - Brave the waves to, "Alexa, ask amid audio to play Ship at Sea."
 - When that dog won't stop barking next door just say, "Alexa, ask amid audio to play Day at the Beach, All Alone."


Note: To use this skill you will be required to link to an existing amidAudio user account. If you don't already have one, head over to https://amidaudio.com to create one.
